entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
